extension.name: WhatsHelp Chat Button
extension.author: WhatsHelp
extension.description:
WhatsHelp Chat Button

1. Navigate to Extensions -> Modules, Press "New", choose "WhatsHelp Chat Button" module from the list. Open the module settings.
2. Go to www.whatshelp.io/widget and get the button code.
3. Check standard module settings (Status, Position, Order, Menu assignment etc).
4. Copy and paste the button code into the form in module settings. Press "Save" button.
